welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brookfield, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mitchell International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is the newest addition to the airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is primarily used for international flights and is connected to the main terminal via a skywalk.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi network for free with a one-time registration.
